cast.name: Margien van Doesen Margien van Doesen

introduction: Bruno says goodbye to his father, who has to leave on a military mission. A film about abandonment and loss.Plot OutlineBruno (8) finds it very interesting that his father, Daan (35), routinely wants to shave his beard and head before he leaves on a dangerous military mission in a desert country far away. When Daan offers his son to shave him, Bruno happily goes at it, while asking his father about his job and in the meantime trying not to cut him. Along with this intimate way of saying goodbye, we see what will happen to Daan on his mission through Bruno playing with his toy soldiers.AwardsOfficial selection for the Tribeca Film Festival 2010 in the Identity Theft program.Official selection for Festival du Cinema Europeen de LilleBest Dutch Short Film at the Go Short Filn Festival NijmegenStarring
